content: I know this isn’t an option for everyone, but if you live somewhere with outdoor space and eggs are non-negotiable, you might want to consider getting a few chickens. They’re easier to care for and less expensive than a dog or cat (in my opinion/experience), and the eggs are amazing. Again, I know that won’t work for everyone, but if anyone out there is considering chickens and worrying that they’ll be too much work, you might be wrong.
